dmca.title: Mesotheliomaweb.org text metastatizing again, in snippets
dmca.body:
Attn: Blogger, DMCA complaints 

Sir/Madam: 

I write to complain about Blogger blogs that have copied material from a website owned by one of my clients. 

1. The copyrighted work at issue is text that appears on the website Mesotheliomaweb.org. 

2. The pages that infringe: 
http://downloadable-products.blogspot.com/2005/10/mesothelioma-web-resources-for.html is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://mesotheliomahow.blogspot.com/ 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

4 
http://igotabrandnewwagon.blogspot.com/ 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

http://onlinereadycash.blogspot.com/2005/07/mesothelioma.html 
contains a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 


http://mesothelioma-updates.blogspot.com/2005/11/mesothelioma-web-resources-for.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://mesothelioma-mesothelioma.blogspot.com/2005/04/introduction_30.html 
has as its first paragraph material from http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm and the rest of its material is from http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://linktomesothe1ioma.blogspot.com/2OO5/l1/httpwwwmesotheliomaweborg.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.orglindex.htm 

http://worldspread.blogspot.com/2005/11/mesothelioma-web.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://mesotheliomacrisis.blogspot.com/2005/11/mesothelioma-web.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://murali-chowdhary.blogspot.com/2005/06/before-internet-it-was-very-hard-to.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org.index.htm 

http://mesotheliomainfoupdates.blogspot.com/2005/11/what-is-mesothelioma-and-how-do-you.html 
copies from 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

http://alome.blogspot.com/2OO5/11/before.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://bigbobohealth.blogspot.com/2005/11/something-disturbing .html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

http://justin-mesothelioma.blogspot.com/2005/10/what-is-exactly-is-mesothelioma-read.html
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

http://d3j4vu.blogspot.com/2OO5/10/mesothelioma-common-questions-what-is.html is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

http://resomeso.blogspot.com/2OO5/11/mesothelioma.html 
is copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

http://O128.blogspot.com/2OO5/11/mesothelioma-common-questions.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesothe1iomaweb.org/mesothe1ioma.htm 

http://mesothelioma-aid.blogspot.com/2005/09/how-do-you-get-mesothelioma.html 
copies from 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 

3. My name is [private]. My e-mail address is [private]@sitecoach.com. 

4. According to the registrar whois.markmonitor.com, the contact information for this site is: 
Google Inc. 
(DOM-345 04 6) 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View 
CA 
94043 US 
Domain Name; blogspot.com 
Administrative Contact: 
DNS Admin 
(NIC-1467103) 
Google Inc. 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View 
CA 
94043 US 
[private]@google.com + 1.[private] Fax- + 1.[private]
I cannot identify the individual bloggers who made the offending posts. 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

7. Some of these blogs copy only two paragraphs, and I normally wouldn
